程序包 P3

接口 Game

所有已知实现类:
chessGame, goGame
public interface Game

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    Board board()  
    boolean capture​(Player player, Position... positions)
    Choice 3 capture a piece in a position the player should be gaming the source-piece should belong to the player and the target-piece should belong to another player if the game is go, there is no target position
    Player choosePlayerByName​(java.lang.String playerName)  
    void end()
    Choice 7 enter "end" to end the game initiative
    java.lang.String gameType()  
    Player isFree​(Player pLayer, int x, int y)
    Choice 4 ask a position whether it is free the position should be within the board
    boolean move​(Player player, Position... positions)
    Choice 2 FOR chess move or put a piece in a position the player should be gaming the source-piece should belong to the player and the target-piece should belong to another player
    static Game newGame​(java.lang.String gameType)
    to generate a particular game according to the String gameType
    java.util.Set<Piece> pieces​(boolean firstFlag)
    the origin pieces of one particular game
    Player player1()  
    Player player2()  
    boolean put​(Player player, Piece piece, Position position)
    Choice 1 put one particular piece on the board the player should be gaming the piece should belong to the player and be out of the board the position should be free and legally in the board
    boolean setPlayers​(Player p1, Player p2)  
    void skip​(Player player)
    Choice 6 skip the choosing
    java.util.Map<Player,​java.lang.Integer> sumPiece​(Player player)
    Choice 5 ask the sum of the piece on the board

  • 方法详细资料

    • newGame

      static Game newGame​(java.lang.String gameType)
      to generate a particular game according to the String gameType
      参数:
      gameType - String of the type of the game
      返回:
      a new chessGame or goGame

    • put

      boolean put​(Player player, Piece piece, Position position)
      Choice 1 put one particular piece on the board the player should be gaming the piece should belong to the player and be out of the board the position should be free and legally in the board
      参数:
      player - the operating player
      piece - the putting piece
      position - the position related to the action
      返回:
      true if the put is legal

    • move

      boolean move​(Player player, Position... positions)
      Choice 2 FOR chess move or put a piece in a position the player should be gaming the source-piece should belong to the player and the target-piece should belong to another player
      参数:
      player - the operating player
      positions - the position related to the action
      返回:
      true if the move is legal

    • capture

      boolean capture​(Player player, Position... positions)
      Choice 3 capture a piece in a position the player should be gaming the source-piece should belong to the player and the target-piece should belong to another player if the game is go, there is no target position
      参数:
      player - the operating player
      positions - the position related to the action
      返回:
      true if the capture is legal

    • isFree

      Player isFree​(Player pLayer, int x, int y)
      Choice 4 ask a position whether it is free the position should be within the board
      参数:
      position - the position related to the action
      返回:
      player if the position is occupied, null if the position is free

    • sumPiece

      java.util.Map<Player,​java.lang.Integer> sumPiece​(Player player)
      Choice 5 ask the sum of the piece on the board
      返回:
      a map whose keys are the players and values are the sum of the pieces of both players

    • skip

      void skip​(Player player)
      Choice 6 skip the choosing

    • end

      void end()
      Choice 7 enter "end" to end the game initiative

    • pieces

      java.util.Set<Piece> pieces​(boolean firstFlag)
      the origin pieces of one particular game
      参数:
      firstFlag - true if the pieces belong to the first hand player, false if not
      返回:
      the set of pieces initialized

    • setPlayers

      boolean setPlayers​(Player p1, Player p2)
      参数:
      p1 - the first hand player
      p2 - the later hand player
      返回:
      true if successfully set the first and second players

    • player1

      Player player1()
      返回:
      first player

    • player2

      Player player2()
      返回:
      second player

    • gameType

      java.lang.String gameType()
      返回:
      the type of the game

    • board

      Board board()
      返回:
      the board of the game

    • choosePlayerByName

      Player choosePlayerByName​(java.lang.String playerName)
      参数:
      playerName - String of the name of a player
      返回:
      the player who owns the name
